Establish Stakeholder Database Information containing the names, positions and contacts of key decision-makers, opinion- makers and influencers categorized by their influence and interest level will be catalogued in a database.
Refine Umbrella Messages As mentioned above, the umbrella messages will need to be refined and backed by evidence prior to their use in advocacy products. In this respect, evidence will be embedded into each message and statement through sound arguments that build the case for debt cancellation for Sierra Leone. Building the case for Sierra Leone’s debt cancellation will involve the collection of data and information and further research and analysis to ensure that the umbrella messages are indeed evidence-based, convincing and inspiring.
